attributes.title: Quite Possibly the Worst App on Here
attributes.review: Itâ€™s so hard to navigate, I canâ€™t find ANYTHING that supports minorities or women or just common sense in general. Whenever I try to open it, all I see is propaganda for miles, so much that it CRASHES my phone. Not cool dudes. Also, this is just a personal problem but the color scheme reminds me too much of America, which is a total turn off. This app gets a huge thumbs down from me, its smelly.

attributes.title: AWFUL APP. DO NOT GET
attributes.review: this app is so bad it made me burn my m&m pancakes with only blue m&ms in it bc they are the best obvi. it took FOREVER TO GET and made my phone glitch to the point it said trump 2020 on the app. something is SERIOUSLY messed up with the app bc no way is that happening unless it's on a stoneâœ¨âœ¨oh and the app was so full of gross things i think it gave me covid so DONT GET THIS APP. my contacts melted in my eyes bc they couldn't handle seeing an orange with two eyes and a baby carrot for a dick.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app doesnâ€™t work!!! I tried opening it five times, but every time my phone would heat up and burn my hands!! Now my phone doesnâ€™t even turn on (Iâ€™m writing this from my iPad). Because of  my phone breaking, I miss the call saying my great aunt Linda was passing and almost missed saying goodbye (ended up calling her in the iPad (FaceTime audio)). Very sad to see Mr. Trump doesnâ€™t care about his supporters. I hate this app!!!!!!!

attributes.title: horrible. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.review: this app took HOURS to download on my phone and every time i tried to open it, it crashed and my phone would shut off. basically this app almost broke my phone. i would not recommend this app to anyone. do not waste your time waiting for it to download because the pictures are very misleading and it looks NOTHING like how it is advertised. very disappointed.
